#id=1
#text=I took a warm bath this evening to relax .
#id=2
#text=I began by drawing myself a bath .
#id=3
#text=I turned the water on and made sure that the temperature was not too hot and not too cold .
#id=4
#text=In the meantime , I removed all of my clothes to prepare for my bath .
#id=5
#text=I turned the water off when it looked like I filled the tub high enough .
#id=6
#text=I then got in and laid down on my back , allowing my lower body to soak .
#id=7
#text=I used a small towel as a cushion for my head .
#id=8
#text=I moved my arms and legs slowly around in the water , almost as if I were swimming .
#id=9
#text=I would occasionally lift my feet up to the top of the bathtub to get a nice stretch .
#text=I used soap and a washcloth to get clean .
#text=I applied the soap to the washcloth , then rubbed the cloth all over my body .
#text=I enjoyed the warmth of my bath for fifteen minutes , then I drained the water .
#text=I used my towel to dry myself off .
#text=Finally , I put my clothes back on .
